name: Bedivere's Quest
description:
King Arthur is dead, and his last request for Sir Bedivere is to take his sacred sword, Excalubur, back to the Lady of the Lake.


Inspired by the Arthurian Legend, Bedivere's Quest is a singleplayer top-down action-adventure game in which you must lead Sir Bedivere through the saxon-infested land of Mercia to reach the Lady of the Lake in the north.

Fight saxons, wolves and the dreaded King Icel himself as you lead the bold knight Sir Bedivere to honour King Arthur's last request.

Credits:
Jotham Bate - Level Design and Mechanics https://jothambate.wixsite.com/gamesdesign
Samuel Bate - Additional Design and Additional Art https://samueljamesbate.wixsite.com/home
Ansimuz - Original Art and Music http://ansimuz.com/site/
Gravity Sound - Sound effects
